p: Literature searches reveal that no studies documented the effect of CMC‐G containing DbE as an antibacterial–antioxidant compound to the inhibition of producing aflatoxin. Since pistachios are one of the most expensive nuts and consumers prefer the natural antimicrobial agents, the aim of this study was to formulate CMC‐G and DbE edible films using different concentrations of DbE and to determine the antioxidant and antimicrobial properties of these composite on pistachio.
